
=head1 NAME

person

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 name (character varying(45)) - 
 address (character varying(45)) - 
 phone (character varying(45)) - 
 email (character varying(45)) - 
 url (character varying(128)) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                           Table "gcis_metadata.person"
  Column  |          Type          |                      Modifiers                      | Storage  | Description 
 ---------+------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+----------+-------------
  id      | integer                | not null default nextval('person_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    | 
  name    | character varying(45)  |                                                     | extended | 
  address | character varying(45)  |                                                     | extended | 
  phone   | character varying(45)  |                                                     | extended | 
  email   | character varying(45)  |                                                     | extended | 
  url     | character varying(128) |                                                     | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "person_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "contributor" CONSTRAINT "contributor_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (person_id) REFERENCES person(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
